Package com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame

Class Astronaut

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.Actor
      • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.Astronaut
  • public class Astronaut
extends Actor
    This is a sample actor that will use the keyboard input to move. It uses four images to perform simple animation. It also fires bullets by adding to a bullet ArrayList.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Astronaut()
      Class constructor that will start the Astronaut off at (0,0), facing right

    • Method Detail

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Adds on to the Actor keyPressed method by updating the sprite to be facing the direction it is travelling.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class Actor
        Parameters:
        e - the KeyEvent

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Adds on to the Actor keyReleased method. It will cycle the firing flag to ensure only one bullet is fired per key press.
        Overrides:
        keyReleased in class Actor
        Parameters:
        e - the KeyEvent

      • shoot

        private void shoot()
        Creates a new bullet. The bullet will move in the direction the sprite is facing.

      • getBullets

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bullet> getBullets()
        Returns the current bullets ArrayList. Used to draw and act all of the existing bullets.
        Returns:
